definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: A well-prepared mind hopes in adversity, and fears in prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 遇事有準備的人逢逆境不失望，處順境不大意。

sentences.english: He was faithful to me in weal and woe.
sentences.chinese: 無論在順境逆境，他一直對我忠誠。

sentences.english: Prosperity discovers vices and adversity virtues.
sentences.chinese: 譯〕順境顯邪惡，逆境見善德。

sentences.english: He who in adversity would have succor, let him be generous while he rests secure. (Saki, British writer)
sentences.chinese: 誰想在逆境中得到援助，就應在身處順境時待人寬厚。

sentences.english: Whether we are in brightness or in darkness, we must be strong.
sentences.chinese: 無論順境或逆境，人應該堅強。

sentences.english: Understand the face of adversity, much like what accept prosperity is much more important.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解面臨逆境，遠好比何接受順境重要得多。

sentences.english: In overcoming the fear, you overcome the conditions and become a stronger person.
sentences.chinese: 在克服害怕的進程中，你會克服順境而成爲剛強的人。

sentences.english: When she ignored him during his financial problem, he knew she was a fair-weather friend.
sentences.chinese: 他知道她只在他處於順境的時候纔是“朋友”。

sentences.english: Similarly, there are good times there will be adversities in life.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，人生有順境也會有逆境。

sentences.english: You'll never become Buddha if cultivating yourself under favoring circumstance.
sentences.chinese: 在順境中修行，永遠不能成佛。

sentences.english: He who in adversity would have succor, let him be generous while he rests secure.
sentences.chinese: 誰想在逆境中得到援助，就應在身處順境時待人寬厚。

sentences.english: We promised to love each other 4ever and ever , through thick and thin, in good times and bad.
sentences.chinese: 我們允諾相愛到永遠，不論是艱難困苦還是順境逆境。

sentences.english: Prosperity doth best discover vice , but adversity doth best discover virtue.
sentences.chinese: 順境時顯陋習，逆境時見美德。

definition: to keep on fighting in spite of all setbacks (idiom)/to be undaunted by repeated setbacks/to be indomitable
